spell1.name: SPIDER-POWER
spell1.description: Swing fists forward to strike, dealing extra damage to the enemy with a Spider-Tracer.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: The first two strikes deal 25 damage, while the third strike deals 40 damage (damage increases for one strike when hitting with Spider-Tracer)Midair strikes are an overhead slam that deal 55 damage

attributes.label: INTERVAL
attributes.value: The first two strikes have an interval of 0.37s between them, while the third strike has a 0.82s interval from the second strike

spell2.name: CYBER-WEB CLUSTER
spell2.description: Shoot a Web-Cluster that deals damage and attaches a Spider-Tracer to the hit enemy.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Projectile that fires in a straight trajectory

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: 30 (consuming Spider-Tracer with another ability deals a further 45)

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 50% at 40m

spell3.name: SPECTACULAR SPIN
spell3.description: Launch Web-Clusters all around to damage and Stun enemies.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Striking an enemy applies a stacking -3% Slow effect for 1 second, and after reaching 20 hits, the enemy will be Stunned for 1.5s.

spell4.name: WEB-SWING
spell4.description: Shoot a strand of webbing to swing.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: If the Easy Swing setting is off, the player can perform a Web Zip with this ability by aiming at a surface below them.

spell5.name: GET OVER HERE!
spell5.description: Shoot webbing to reel in the hit enemy. If the enemy is tagged with a Spider-Tracer, Spider-Man will get pulled to them instead.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Projectile that fires in a straight trajectory

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: If the target is marked by a Spider-Tracer, the player can perform a Web Strike that automatically locks onto the enemy.

spell6.name: AMAZING COMBO
spell6.description: Launch an enemy upward, dealing extra damage to the enemy with a Spider-Tracer.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: 60 (damage increases for one strike when hitting with Spider-Tracer)

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Can only be cast again after landing

spell8.name: WALL CRAWL
spell8.description: Press Space to wall crawl, and while crawling, left-click to sprint.

spell9.name: SPIDER-SENSE
spell9.description: Give a warning of enemies that have been around.
